Forms - Normal

Title as an H3

The form is a div.form, h2 for the title and fieldset and each form element is in a dl, with the labels held in a dt and the controls in a dd. The buttons are in a separate div.buttons

Forms - Grouped

Title as an H3

The form is a div.form, h2 for the title and fieldset and each form element is in a dl, with the labels held in a dt and the controls in a dd. The buttons are in a separate div.buttons
